Html:
Hi radioman,

Is there any known bug about that : 

When I install my application on a pc which does not have an internet connection, I can not open my application (it crashes).

But if i :

1. connect it one time to the internet

2. launch the program 

3. close the program

4 disconnect internet

, then I can work with my application without any problem

 

Maybe a cache issue ?
it has nothing to do with internet connection, the issue is somewhere else
